products.name: Panasonic 1.9 GHz 1-Handset Cordless Phone With 2.2" LCD Display (KXPRW120) - Black
products.shortDescription: Outfit your home or office with the stylish, high-tech Panasonic KXPRW120 cordless phone. Featuring integrated WiFi, this phone allows you to use your smartphone or tablet to make and receive landline calls. A call block list can stop up to 100 unwelcome numbers from reaching you.

products.name: magicJack GO VOIP Phone Adapter (K1103)
products.shortDescription: Keep your landline while breaking your commitment to costly monthly bills. The MagicJack GO works with corded, cordless or portable landline phones, giving you access to crystal clear quality phone calls without having to hand over your savings to the telephone company.

products.name: Motorola 2-Handset DECT 6.0 Corded/Cordless Phone with Answering Machine (L702CBT) - Black
products.shortDescription: The Motorola two-handset phone comes with a corded and cordless handset, offering versatile convenience. Bluetooth allows you to link your mobile phone for making landline and mobile calls on one line, while a digital answering machine records messages.

products.name: Panasonic 4-Handset DECT 6.0 Cordless Phone (KXTGC214B)
products.shortDescription: Stay connected at home with this Panasonic one-line DECT 6.0 four-handset cordless phone. You can place each handset anywhere in the house, like the den, kitchen, master bedroom and living room, so you don't have to scramble when the phone rings. A convenient feature blocks up to 30 unwanted calls.

products.name: Panasonic 2-Handset DECT 6.0 Cordless Phone With Answering Machine (KXTGC222B)
products.shortDescription: Stay in touch with the Panasonic DECT 6.0 cordless phone. Featuring an integrated digital answering machine, this phone can record 15 minutes of messages when you're away. A call block list allows you to program up to 30 numbers of unwelcome callers, while the backlit LCD and lighted keypad make it easy to see the phone day or night.

products.name: Ooma Telo 2 Internet Phone
products.shortDescription: Do away with expensive telephone bills with the Ooma Telo 2 system. Get crystal clear nationwide and worldwide calling plus all the features you want in a landline, from caller ID to remote and online voicemail retrieval.

products.name: Panasonic 3-Handset DECT 6.0 Cordless Phone With Answering Machine (KXTGE243B)
products.shortDescription: Stay connected at home with this Panasonic one-line DECT 6.0 three-handset cordless phone. With a talking caller ID, you don't have to rush to the screen to know who's calling. Nifty features include a call block list of up to 250 unwanted callers, and convenient dual keypad on the base and each handset.

products.name: Panasonic 1.9 GHz 2-Handset Cordless Phone With Bluetooth System (KXPRD262) - Black
products.shortDescription: With the Panasonic KXPRD262 Link 2 Cell cordless phone, you don't have to stay glued to your smartphone when you're at home. Bluetooth allows you to pair your smartphone with the home phone, so you can answer mobile calls on the cordless phone. The base unit can even tell you who's texting.

products.name: Panasonic 3-Handset DECT 6.0 Plus Cordless Phone (KXTG4713B)
products.shortDescription: Featuring three handsets and one base unit, the Panasonic KXTG4713B DECT 6.0 Plus cordless phone only needs one phone jack to use all its handsets. An amplified receiver, volume control and a sound equalizer ensure clear, distortion-free calls. Call block lets you block calls from up to 50 numbers and the speakerphone makes it easy to take hands-free calls when you're doing other things.

products.name: Panasonic 3-Handset DECT 6.0 Cordless Phone With Answering Machine (KXTGH223B)
products.shortDescription: Stay connected home and away with the Panasonic KXTGH223B three-handset cordless phone. A digital answering machine records up to 15 minutes of messages, which can be checked remotely from your smartphone or office line. With a 250-number call block list, this phone can help stop unwelcome calls from coming in.

products.name: Panasonic 4-Handset DECT 6.0 Cordless Phone With Answering Machine (KXTGD224B)
products.shortDescription: Stay in touch with the Panasonic DECT 6.0 cordless phone. Featuring an integrated digital answering machine, this phone can record 15 minutes of messages when you're away. A call block list allows you to program up to 60 numbers of unwelcome callers, while talking caller ID tells you who's calling without the need to read the phone.

products.name: Brother Black Toner Cartridge (TN-630)
products.shortDescription: Print important documents with rich, deep colour. This Brother Toner yields approximately 1,200 pages of vibrant tonal quality.

products.name: AT&T 3-Handset DECT 6.0 Cordless Phone with Answering Machine (TL92373)
products.shortDescription: With the AT&T TL92373 three-handset cordless phone, you don't have to worry about missing another cellphone call at home. Connect your Bluetooth-enabled cellphone to the cordless phone to make and take cellular calls. The handsets will even alert you when your Android phone receives a text, email or social media update. A digital answering machine is built in to record 11 minutes of messages.

products.name: Sony 4GB Digital Voice Recorder (ICDBX140)
products.shortDescription: Get set for easy recording anywhere thanks to the light and Sony ICDBX140 digital voice recorder. It has 4GB of internal flash memory for storing up to 4,175 hours of audio. You get clear, crisp results and minimal background noise with the Noise Cut function and Low Cut filter.

products.name: Ooma Telo VoIP/Internet Phone System with Bluetooth Adapter
products.shortDescription: The Ooma Telo Phone System connects to your high-speed internet and existing home phones, allowing you to enjoy free home phone service, free Canadian calling, and exceptionally low international rates. Enjoy the convenience of voice mail, caller ID, call waiting, and 911 service at no extra charge. Pay only applicable taxes and fees. It comes with an Ooma Bluetooth adapter.

products.name: Brother Black Toner Cartridge (TN-660)
products.shortDescription: Brother high yield toner cartridge for quality printing of your important documents.

products.name: Panasonic 1-Handset DECT 6.0 Link2Cell Cordless Phone with iPhone 6 Charging Dock (KXPRL262)
products.shortDescription: The Panasonic KXPRL262 is a Bluetooth Link 2 Cell home phone that also acts as a dock and charger for any iPhone 6/6S with a Lightning connector. You can remotely play your favourite music stored in the playlists on your iPhone. The 1.8" colour LCD screen handsets function as a remote control to play, stop, and scan songs.

products.name: Panasonic 1-Handset DECT 6.0 Cordless Phone with Wi-Fi (KXPRW130)
products.shortDescription: The Panasonic KXPRW130 is WiFi equipped so you can use your smartphone or tablet to receive and make landline calls. A dedicated setup button makes connecting to your home router easy. The talking caller ID announces the name of your caller between rings.

products.name: Panasonic 2-Handset DECT 6.0 Cordless Phone With Bluetooth (KXTGE262S)
products.shortDescription: Stay connected at home or when you're away with this Panasonic one-line DECT 6.0 two-handset Bluetooth-enabled cordless phone. Link to your smartphone to make and receive cellphone calls through the handset. Nifty features include a talking caller ID so you hear who's calling and remote notification for checking messages while in the office.

products.name: Cobra Walkie Talkies (CXT145C)
products.shortDescription: The Cobra CXT145C Walkie Talkies keeps you connected with their 16 mile extended range. It offers 22 different channels and call alert, so you never miss a message. Audible beep tones indicate when a transmission has ended and it's clear for others to talk. Stay up to date on storms and emergencies with the built-in NOAA radio receiver.

products.name: Panasonic 1-Handset DECT 6.0 Cordless Phone with 3.5" Touchscreen LCD (KXPRX120)
products.shortDescription: The Panasonic KXPRX120 has all the convenience and versatility of a smartphone built into this 3.5" touchscreen LCD home phone.  The supported Android 4.0 OS allows you to use your favourite apps such as Facebook, Twitter, Skype, and Google, without data charges. The 0.3MP front camera makes video calling with loved ones a breeze.

products.name: DYMO LabelManager 160 Label Maker - Black
products.shortDescription: Embark on a labelling spree with the DYMO LabelManager 160 label maker. Featuring an array of font styles, symbols and clip art images, LabelManager lets you create professional-looking labels for everything from folders in the office to food in your fridge. The computer-style keyboard with shortcut keys makes it a breeze to type up labels.

products.name: Vtech DECT 6.0GHz 4-Handset Cordless Phone With Answering Machine (CS6729-4) - Silver
products.shortDescription: Enjoy the freedom and mobility of the VTech CS6729-4 cordless phone. It comes with four handsets and a base keypad with dual caller ID/call waiting. DECT 6.0 digital technology ensures excellent sound quality, range and security, and a digital answering system records up to 11 minutes of messages when you can't get to the phone.

products.name: VTech DECT 6.0 3-Handset Cordless Phone With Answering Machine (CS6124-31)
products.shortDescription: Multiply your talking capacity without taking up more phone jacks. VTech's CS6124-31 phone system provides three handsets that only require the use of one plug, so you have the freedom and mobility of a cordless system that you can use in any room of the office or house while leaving your outlets free for other devices.

products.name: Panasonic 2-Handset DECT 6.0 Cordless Phone With Caller ID (KXTGC212S) - Silver
products.shortDescription: Make and take the calls you want with the Panasonic DECT 6.0 cordless phone. Featuring a 30-number call block list, this phone can help stop those annoying telemarketers and salespeople from reaching you. The 1.6" backlit LCD display and lighted keypad make it easy to see and use the phone day or night.

products.name: Energizer "AA" 1.5V 4-Pack Batteries
products.shortDescription: Keep the juice flowing in all your products, from your remote control to your portable boombox, with Energizer 4-pack "AA" alkaline batteries; battery tester included.

products.name: Clarity Amplified Phone with Photo Memory Buttons (P300)
products.shortDescription: With picture dialling and a large keypad, the Clarity amplified phone is easy for anyone to use. It also features an extra-loud ringer and adjustable volume to meet your needs.

products.name: Cricut Explore Multi-Function Die Cutting Machine - White/Green
products.shortDescription: Get professional-looking results with do-it-yourself simplicity from the Cricut Explore design-and-cut system. Produce greeting cards, event invitations, and scrapbooking or home décor solutions. Select from Cricut's online library of 50, 000+ images or upload your own designs and cut a wide range of shapes and sizes for custom creative projects.

products.name: Sony 4GB Digital Voice Recorder (ICDUX543B)
products.shortDescription: What can you do with a voice recorder? Create memos, practice speeches, conduct interviews, and more. This Sony Digital Voice Recorder provides 4GB of space for recording MP3 files you can play back anywhere, anytime.

products.name: VTech DECT 6.0 2-Handset Cordless Phone with Answering Machine (LS6425-2)
products.shortDescription: With 2 handsets and a built-in digital answering machine, this VTech phone bundle is the ideal communication device for every home. It can even announce who's calling on all of the handsets and base unit, so you always know who's on the other end before you answer the phone.

products.name: HP 83A Black Toner (CF283A)
products.shortDescription: The HP CF283A black toner cartridge helps you print professional-quality documents with sharp black-and-white contrasts for crisp text and clear graphics. Each laser cartridge yields up to 1,500 pages.

products.name: Panasonic 1-Handset DECT 6.0 Cordless Phone with Caller ID and Call Block (KXPRS120)
products.shortDescription: Boasting Euro styling, the Panasonic KXPRS120 cordless phone is a sleek addition to any home. It features talking caller ID and a call block list, so you can filter out the calls you don’t want to take.
